thread.title: Silk Road Explore Announces Latest Tour Packages and Prices for Historic Silk Road Excursions
thread.title_full: Silk Road Explore Announces Latest Tour Packages and Prices for Historic Silk Road Excursions

author: prbuzz.com
title: Silk Road Explore Announces Latest Tour Packages and Prices for Historic Silk Road Excursions
text:
Kyrgyz Republic – The Silk Road is historic route that’s on the World Heritage list. Silk Road Explore features more than 180 unique package tours along the Silk Road in multiple countries. Prices of ready-made tours range from 35-50 U.S. dollars for ATV and rafting tours to $4,750 for heli-skiing. Tours are also offered at fixed dates and rates ranging from $800 to $2,000. SRE professionals can calculate prices of tours upon request.
“SRE is a cool project and we are pleased to provide the greatest variety of tours in Kyrgyzstan on one website,” said Osyanin. “We can also help our customers to choose any tour through the Silk Road and the Caucasus.”
At Silk Road Explore, individuals can learn about and book excursions, treks, Jeep or bike tours, and skiing trips. Individuals can trace the steps of Marco Polo on horseback riding explorations and engage in mountaineering adventures. Travelers can enjoy tours focused on cultural attractions, nomadic history and culture, culinary endeavors, and historic cities.
For those who prefer more strenuous adventures, individuals can white water raft down various rivers and journey through the Valley of Castles. Rafting tours are available for those of varied experience levels, from professionals to those who have never rafted before.
Ski holidays taken along the Silk Road are popular vacation and getaway destinations. Travelers can enjoy cross-country, heli-skiing and freeriding excursions. Pre-packaged options are available and SRE professionals are available 24/7 to assist individuals who want to customize their experience.
One-day tours are offered to UNESCO sites, historic museums and monuments, thermal springs, and the famed Ulugbek Observatory. Travelers can experience folklore shows and falconry demonstrations, participate in a craft tour, and visit glaciers and ancient monasteries.
“We are happy to provide quality services to our customers and we are very pleased to receive their positive comments about travel and about us,” said SRE project manager, Evgenia Baturskaya.
Silk Road Explore is a single, comprehensive resource for locating the most highly sought tour packages along the Silk Road and at the most affordable prices. The agency offers an easy way for people to discover their options and book a dream tour for a once-in-a-lifetime experience in Central Asia.
For more information, email at or visit Silk Road Explore online.
About the Company:
Travel agency Silk Road Explore offers more than 180 ready-made and exciting tours in the countries located on the territory of the famous Silk Road that includes China, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Georgia and Iran. On the website silkroadexplore.com , travelers can find tours at the best prices, from day trips, tours with fixed dates and a variety of other tours in different areas, including trekking, excursions, horseback riding, Jeep tours, rafting, mountaineering and skiing. You can also rent a car for independent travel. The agency provides the most comfortable and safe options for online payments that includes Visa and MasterCard.
